body: FWIW, this is not just a cgo related issue, it already occurs in some of the syscal-wrappers. For example, an implementation of syscall.Mmap needs to do basically the same construction.  It would be helpful if there is an API - even under unsafe - available that hides the implementation details and memory-layout for slices away. (Assuming the API doesn't need to change or can be augmented with an refined version).
